description: first half, ff. 144. 250 x 170; 190 x 125 mm. 25 lin. 14th/15th cen. Commentary on Ptolemyʼs Opus quadripartitum: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 638 (4: no. 16); S I, 886; Ullmann, Die Natur- und Geheimwissenschaften im Islam, p. 337. Incip.: ... قال ابوالحسن على بن رضوان ... قصدنا ان تشرح اقاوىل بطلمىوس
author: ʻAli ibn Riḍwān, -approximately 1068
